releaseInfo.notes:
IBM code to enable 'class data sharing' in Equinox. https://ausgsa.ibm.com/gsa/ausgsa/projects/w/was.dev_tools/prereqs/prereq.osgi.fw.cds/2.1.0/20100913/download.zip
Normally we can get this from WAS from the above location, but the 2.2.0 jar is not available in WAS yet. It has been downloaded from http://ies.ottawa.ibm.com/iss/ies/downloads/buildpage.php?build=I-I20120314-201203141630&os=win32,win32,x86 JXE shared classes Runtime/com.ibm.cds_2.2.0.zip
The COO that needs to be quoted for using the 2.2.0 CDS jar is "IBM Eclipse SDK 3.4.1 /JXE 2.0.6 GA" COO# CA720080178
